name: @jafar/react-editor
description: Create jafar form model using a simple UI

scripts.build-package: rm -rf dist/* && node ../../node_modules/@babel/cli/bin/babel.js  src/components --out-dir dist --copy-files && cp package.json ./dist && cp .npmrc ./dist
scripts.ci-e2e: PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run build-website && ../../node_modules/start-server-and-test/src/bin/start.js 'serve -l 3000 -s build' http://localhost:3000/ e2e
scripts.publish-package: npm publish dist --access public || echo publish failed
scripts.deploy-website: PUBLIC_URL=https://yahoo.github.io/jafar/react-editor npm run build-website && gh-pages --dist build --dest react-editor
